definition[0]: a character in the book Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland  by Lewis  Carroll, who is known for ordering people’s heads to be cut off, by saying ‘Off with his head!’
definition[1]: a character from a nursery rhyme (=an old song or poem for young children): The Queen of Hearts, she baked some tarts, /All on a summer’s day; / The Knave of Hearts, he stole the tarts, /And took them clean away.
